title: Kaya's Short Story Collection
description: In this keepsake collection, Kaya draws strength from the legends and lessons of her elders. Kaya's world is filled with the beauty of the earth and the joy of tradition. But it is also full of change. As the Nez Perce people move with the seasons to hunt and gather, Kaya faces the new responsibilities that come with taking her place in the community.
author: Janet Beeler Shaw
